DataElement.preferredName: Patient Questionnaires Completion Baseline Future Agreement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to questions which are necessary to allow clinical study participation that address the completion of patient questionnaires at baseline, in addition to the patient's act of agreeing to complete future questionnaires as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Questionnaire Complete Baseline Future Agreement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion._A starting point to which things may be compared._A time that is yet to come._The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.:Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Complete Baseline Future Agreement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.:A starting point to which things may be compared.:A time that is yet to come.:The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
A starting point to which things may be compared.
A time that is yet to come.
The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Immunity from an obligation or duty.

Concepts.definition: Immunity from an obligation or duty.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 11-21-18 TT released/CWinch. 12/1/17 added PV, edit to LN. 10/17/17 tt CE7

ReferenceDocuments.name: If the patient has agreed to
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient has agreed to particiate in optional questionnaire completion, the patient has completed the baseline quality of life questionnaires (EORTC QLQ-C30 +QLQ-BR23 and Arm and Breast Symptom Questionnaire), health utilities questionnaire (EQ-5D) and lost productivity questionnaire within 14 days prior to randomization and is willing to complete future assessments.
